description: A Jewish festival song was filmed sung from the minaret of a mosque in the West Bank city of Jenin.
maintext: "IDF forces operate according to the values and spirit of the IDF," he said. "Soldiers on the battlefield are required to act professionally and ethically, and we will not compromise on this. In any event... [the videos do not] align with IDF values, command and disciplinary steps will be taken - this is the way in the IDF."
title: Israeli soldiers' mosque behaviour condemned by IDF
